channel.title: DJRefleXion's Podcast
channel.description:
Motivated by his insatiable love for music and the art of entertainment one of Japan's most electrifying MCs and Event Hosts relocated to Las Vegas and was reborn as "DJ RefleXion." DJ RefleXion may be a rookie in the game now but he's no stranger to the spotlight having rocked events with bonafide stars such as Flo Rida,T-Pain,Ne-yo,Yung Joc,Chingy,Gorilla Zoe, and Bobby Valentino...just to name a few during his time in Tokyo.
DJ RefleXion can now be found blowing the roof off of various venues around Sin City and L.A . His style can be best described as a "RefleXion" of whatever type of music that is needed to get the party rocking till the cops come knockin! DJ RefleXion is determined at perfecting his craft and strengthening his network of supporters all in hopes of one day being known as one of the best to ever rock a show!
Sit back,relax,and get taken on a musical journey you're now tuned into DJ RefleXion's raw un-edited podcast. Thanks for stopping by and Please feel free to send all booking inquiries and mixtape host requests to djreflexion@gmail.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: "The King of Track Selection"
channel.itunes:author: DJ RefleXion

item.title: D.Focis "The Be Strong LP" Listening Session
item.description: I was just sitting here listening to this album for the fourth time and thought to myself "I wish more people could hear this." So, I decided to deviate from my normal format and record a listening session. This is one of my favorite albums right now major or indie. Mainly because it's just real and real damn inspirational. For those of you out there that have a dream of making your mark in this cold world this LP is for you. Please take a little time out of your day and listen to this LP it not only sounds good but it feels good too! True music for the soul. Hold fast to your dreams and never give up when you're faced with obstacles and adversity BE STRONG! For more of D.focis head over to Dfocis.blogspot.com 1. Forever 2. Who do you believe in? feat Kamilion 3. The Voice 4. Miracle feat. Bobby Creekwater and T.York 5. Forgiveness feat. Kamilion and Sashay of the Kalonjii Movement 6. In the Beginning feat Tha Mr. and T.York 7. In the Sky 8. Here I am 9. Real 10. Be Strong 11. I Wish feat Wizdom 12. Number One Fan feat Wise and Quesan 13. You All Songs produced by D.Focis for Facemusic except track 1 (prod. by Lord Lamont/KHZPRO for KHZPRODUCTIONS) and tracks 3, 9 (prod. by Leak for Craftwork Records) Executive Produced by Dr. Redd R.J.G. Branner for DRP The Be Strong LP is dedicated to the memory of Curtis Weeks, and also to the future of his son CJ. contact facemusiccorp@gmail.com for all business inquires.
item.dc:creator: DJ RefleXion
item.itunes:summary:
I was just sitting here listening to this album for the fourth time and thought to myself "I wish more people could hear this." So, I decided to deviate from my normal format and record a listening session. This is one of my favorite albums right now major or indie. Mainly because it's just real and real damn inspirational. For those of you out there that have a dream of making your mark in this cold world this LP is for you. Please take a little time out of your day and listen to this LP it not only sounds good but it feels good too! True music for the soul. Hold fast to your dreams and never give up when you're faced with obstacles and adversity BE STRONG! For more of D.focis head over to Dfocis.blogspot.com
1. Forever 2. Who do you believe in? feat Kamilion 3. The Voice 4. Miracle feat. Bobby Creekwater and T.York 5. Forgiveness feat. Kamilion and Sashay of the Kalonjii Movement 6. In the Beginning feat Tha Mr. and T.York 7. In the Sky 8. Here I am 9. Real 10. Be Strong 11. I Wish feat Wizdom 12. Number One Fan feat Wise and Quesan 13. You
All Songs produced by D.Focis for Facemusic except track 1 (prod. by Lord Lamont/KHZPRO for KHZPRODUCTIONS) and tracks 3, 9 (prod. by Leak for Craftwork Records)
Executive Produced by Dr. Redd R.J.G. Branner for DRP
The Be Strong LP is dedicated to the memory of Curtis Weeks, and also to the future of his son CJ.
contact facemusiccorp@gmail.com for all business inquires.

item.title: THE LOVE MARATHON!
item.description: Welcome to the love marathon! 1 hr and 58 mins of straight lovemaking music. Turn all TVs off and put the lights down low lets go! THE 2HR LOVE MARATHON PODCAST 1.Intro 2.Decisions NeYo 3.So You Can Cry Ne-Yo 4.Customer R.Devaughn 5.Believe R.Devaughn 6.When It Hurts Avant 7.Knockin Boots Pretty Rick 8.Beautiful (Clean) Akon Feat 9.Mad Ne-Yo 10.Diagnosed With Love Chris Brown 11.Number One Girl Joe 12.Not Anymore Letoya 13.Brutha -She's Gone (Clean) Brutha 14.She Got Her Own (Miss Independent Official Remix) (Clean) NeYo 15.Imma Put It On Her (Clean) Day 26 16.Pony (Album) Ginuwine 17.Boyfriend #2 (Dirty) Pleasure P 18.Brand New Trey Songz 19.Good Good Ashanti 20.Halo (Clean) Beyonce 21.Don't Leave Me Blackstreet 22.Sadie R. Kelly 23.You Make Me Wanna (Extended Version) Usher 24.Your Body's Callin' R. Kelly 25.Hands on Me (Clean) Bobby V. 26.I Need A Girl (Clean) Trey Songz 27.Hit Me on Twitter (Dirty) Mistah F.A.B. 28.Trick'N (Clean) Mullage 29.Computer Love (Remix) Zapp and Roger 30.Anniversary Tony Toni Tone 31.Pretty Wings Maxwell 32.My Boo Alicia Keys/Usher 33.Put it Down (Dirty) The Dream 34.So Good (Remix) Electrik Red Bossy Lady 35.Rick Ross ft NeYo 36.I'm Gonna Leave Yung Menace/ft Marc Simpson 37.Outro
